PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Check this guide instead https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/3324373
Self-chill: (take shaper of winter) - fulcrum + winterweave - call of the void + winterweave - wand with 4s veiled trigger - shield charge cast on crit + hits can't be evaded? or precision? or accuracy support+mods?
Good stuff:
- Explode - weapon synthesis implicit - chest influence (crusader or warlord?) - asenath (need cold conversion elsewhere: 40% watcher + 40% mastery) - oriath's end flask - obliteration - profane bloom - herald of ice - herald of ash
